name: Six (itch)
description:
Help Six (a robot) to reprogram his AI chip by guiding him through a series of platform puzzle levels.  Try to use as few commands as possible because the more commands you use the worse his AI programming will be.

Made for the Ludum Dare #40 Jam Dec 1st - Dec 4th 2017.
Everything was built, coded, drawn, and played by me Jason Forsythe (CodeChomper) Please visit my submission @ Ludum Dare to rate my game!

Thanks!
